author: J. Crawford
title: You won't know why until you have one
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Why do people love their Apple Watches? It's just a watch, for pete's sake! But if you have one you know right away. There's a small miracle that happens in a busy life when you can answer your phone (er, watch?) with your hands full. Or just glancing down to see the text message you just got. Or even completing those freaking rings (don't know? of you will). There's very little bad I can say after having my Series 2 for the last couple of years. I'm happy to get the 3 to have the always-on feature of cellular. I can leave the house and it's not even a problem if I left my phone. Or go for a walk without having a heavy phone in my pocket. It's not even about style, there's just a huge practicality of having a small device attached to your wrist that makes so many problems go away. Here are the positives:• Excellent watch. Like, as a watch.• Receive calls. Make calls.• Receive text messages. Facebook, Twitter, IG, and more.• Interchangeable bands. Fit the look you want, change on a dime.• Siri• Alarms, notes and all the other little apps.• Fitness trackingReally, I don't have any cons. I know people think a smart phone in your back pocket is the top, but this just changes the game. I don't know a single person who ever got an Apple Watch and didn't like it. And the funny thing is you'll never know unless you get one - Because how it changes what you do is the thing that makes it amazing. It's all those small little ways that make for a stupidly brilliant product.Seriously, you, your wife, your boyfriend - It make a perfect gift.

author: Amazon Customer
title: A huge and worthwhile upgrade to a series 1
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I love this watch! I upgraded from a series 1. It runs so smooth and flawlessly compared to series 1. It feels like what the Apple Watch was meant to be. The ability for Siri to talk back is refreshing. The ability to see HTML emails is a huge plus as well. And finally the fact that it is waterproof seals the deal.

author: Amazon Customer
title: WoW!!!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: First off... I don’t write reviews, but WOW! was I impressed with this product. This series 3 watch 42mm GPS came brand new. The box was still seal and the protective plastic on the watch was still on the watch. I bought this for my nephew for his Birthday and was worry that when he opened the box their was going to be things missing I took a risk and I’m glad I did. Thanks to this seller and would definitely buy again. HAPPY HOLIDAYS!

author: Assorted Gear
title: Great for those who wear watches and are okay with daily charging
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I like the Apple Watch Series 3. After trying it out for a few days I realized a few things: I don't wear watches often enough to justify the cost; You'll likely need to charge it daily; It's great for those who already wear watches everyday and can remember to charge it at night; You'll still use your iPhone to handle most tasks. If you want something only for fitness and/or sleep tracking buy a FitBit.

author: Benjamin
title: Great upgrade from Series 1
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Upgraded from a Series 1 to this Series 3.  I can't believe the difference in speed!  That alone made the upgrade absolutely worth it!  The move between apps and the messages app are smooth and succinct.  The added features that my old watch did not have are intuitive and time-saving: the raise to talk Siri is perfect and works flawlessly.  Not having to "call out" to Siri is great.  The walkie-talkie feature is a tad clumsy, but works well for a quick check-in to/from my wife while I am at work.  The kids have enjoyed it too when they miss me during the longer days.  While I have not swam with the watch, I have worn it in the shower a handful of times.  The water eject button is quite intelligent.  I think it simply uses sounds waves to push the water out of the speaker port.  You can hear a "wshhh" sound, hearing its effectiveness.  I will say though, the pitch/volume of the eject noise is quite loud...people WILL look!Like many others, I was hesitating between the new Series 4 and this Series 3.  I got it for $229 for Black Friday and simply could not pass up that deal at nearly HALF off a new 4.  I don't regret it one bit and am glad I took the plunge!

author: Michael Nieto
title: Came right on time however disappointed on the track details!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Exactly what I wanted for my sister, the description was accurate. However I’m a bit disappointed on the GPS tracker from track order. Overall it’s great!

author: Mireya Aguilar
title: Definitely recommend
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Thought the 42mm was going to be too big with my small wrist. It ended up looking great and got here earlier than expected

author: Tamrick
title: Adapter
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Did not receive the adapter for the charging cable.

author: Legion Sauce
title: Prime with the win
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I ordered this watch this morning and it arrived 6 hours later. It’s brand new still in the official Apple box sealed and came with an extra band(S/M) and the magnetic USB. I must say I am thrilled with the watch, the speed of delivery, and overall awesomeness of Prime!

author: Sam H.
title: Everything is important!!!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Fantastic bit of kit, highly recommend purchasing it. You can monitor calls, txt and emails just by looking at your watch, tell Siri to txt/call someone while driving and people don’t even realize you’re talking through your watch while keeping your hands on the steering wheel!!! Can’t tell you how pleased I am!!

author: mel24522
title: It's not techy enough, just texts to my wrist mainly.
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Ok, I'm not that tech savvy but I thought the watch would do more! I really thought I could use Siri like I use it on my phone, which was a big selling point for me. 8/10 times I use Siri it tells me to continue on my phone. I asked Siri to take me to 'such and such' and it gave me directions with a vibration to the wrist with turns (really close to turning, should give a bit more time to get in the lane lol) which I like. It's good for having your texts at your wrist and that's about it for me. I tried to answer a call on it while my phone was in the other room but the quality was so bad they hung up. It won't set an alarm, only a timer. No Google/internet searching whatsoever (hince no Siri). No scrolling through your social media like FB or Reddit but gives notifications which is annoying. It's kinda like heyyyy pick up your cell and look at this. The battery is good, I haven't charged it in almost 3 days. It tells me to stand up if I'm sitting for an hour. I can ping me cell when I misplace it. That's about all i have used it for. I really didn't need to be closer to my text messages so it's not worth it to me.

author: Maribeth Miller
title: Watched caused huge gash in my 12 year old while swimming!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: My daughter got this for Christmas as she is a competitive swimming and was using the watch to track her swimming.  Yesterday, January 9, she called from practice to tell me that the watch had cut open her arm and it was bleeding so badly that the coaches told her she needed to go home.  The coaches cleaned up the 6 inch wound inside her upper arm.  On close inspection of the watch, although not visible, I noticed a little lip in the beveled part of the glass.  When I ran my nail under it it lifted and the glass looked like a razor blade.  Checked online and found same complaints on apple website. Parents be advised.  Thankfully it was her inner upper arm and not her wrist!

author: VJ
title: Apple Watch always Excited
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: First Apple Watch for my spouse as a Wedding Gift. She is excited and speechless... Will go with additional strap to add a sporty look.

author: Luna K.
title: Stuck in loading :(
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: The watch was in a constant state of pooping the Apple logo and did not break out of it even with a reset.

author: Hunter
title: My Second Apple Watch
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: After getting the initial Apple Watch, I am so excited for the upgrade with the Series 3. After weighing the differences between the Series 3 and Series 4, I decided that this was not only cost effective but completely comparable to the Series 4. The newest model only has marginal differences such as an ECG meter and a slightly brighter screen, but in the era of negligible upgrades there really is no reason not to consider this model over the newer ones. Unless the Series 4 drops in price or even newer, future models has features like a selfie camera, why pay the price? Great for parents and students who want the power of a new Apple Watch without the price burden. Not a lower standard!

author: XtremeFX
title: Amazing X-Mas Gift at an Amazing Price!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: This is a awesome gift at 225$ and prime shipped on black friday, in sealed box, with full 1 year warranty by apple. i'm very glad with my order. this is the Series 3 and has several updates from my previous series 1, love the waterproof design for this! it keeps me up to date with my notifications and more, without needed to take my phone out of my pocket every time it rings!

author: Shannon LeGro
title: Will not take a charge, and is now dead.  *Update below*
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: *Update within parenthesis....(Took watch over to Apple Store, and thankfully it isn't the watch, but the charger, so beware if you have this issue. Not really sure now all pieces of this set is in fact new?)My daughter opened this yesterday. Let her wear it for a while before placing it on the charger. Did not charge at all. By the time I figured this out,I tried turning it on and off/hard resets, and then finally the update it needed through the app. It was too low on battery to complete the update. If that was the issue, it’s a moot point now. It’s a mini paper weight. Dead and unable to charge. I am getting my own watch in a couple days...so hoping my charger will work and that the actual watch for my daughter isn’t a goner. Very disappointing considering it’s a brand new item.

author: Blueman
title: Defective!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: After wasting most of a day with apple tech support, I had to accept the fact that this apple watch was defective. Decided to pay a little more and order directly ftom apple. I had such a difficult time understanding the Amazon representative! Finally, i think, my return authorization was taken care of. Who knows, Indian language reps?

author: Edgeman
title: Once you go Apple, you'll never go back
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: As the owner of a Series 2 Apple watch for  just over 3 years, I had intended to upgrade to the new Series 4 watch until I saw Amazon's sale of the Series 3 watches.  It was too good to pass up.  I can't see much of a change in functionality from the Series 2, so no learning curve is required.  After three years, the battery on my series 2 was approaching the end of it's life which required a recharge during the day to make it past 5:00pm.  I expect at least three years of battery life out of this Series 3 before needing to upgrade again.My Series 2 watch put every other watch I own on the shelf, and I have no intentions of ever wearing them again.  This watch does everything, even the things I didn't know I needed before.  The main feature I wished was better is battery life.  You only get about 18 hours out of a new, fully charged Apple Watch, so it needs to go on the charger every night.My biggest recommendation is to also purchase a screen protector.  (Can't stress this enough, so BUY ONE!)  That is very cheap insurance to prevent a very expensive repair if you're outside of the Apple Care window.  I think I had to pay $200 to replace the display on my Series 2 watch, so consider yourself warned.

author: Arvell White
title: Paid $283 For An Apple Box Without The Watch
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Didn’t Even Recieve An Apple Watch In The Box.Just The Apple Box With The Charger & The Small/Medium Band.

author: velvetrider
title: Treat Yourself
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I bought the Apple Watch for fitness tracking. It is THE thing at my gym. I went from a Fitbit to this and wow! I think the tracking is way more accurate.  I’ve been one of those that rolled my eyes at this watch because who really needs this right? I’ve been pleasantly surprised at how much I love this and how have I lived without it? Everything cane brand new in the box - watch, band, charger. I did not like the band so have purchased another. The battery life isn’t great. I find myself having to charge every day or every other day. With my Fitbit, it was maybe once a week. But we all know Apple + batteries does not equal great things. So...go ahead and treat yourself! Order yourself one!

author: Korrhi
title: The watch is perfect
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: The watch is perfect. It came two days later ALTHOUGH I paid for next day shipping!! I’m also missing the adapter that was suppose to be included.

author: BLANCA JOHANNA MARQUEZ VERA
title: NO ME LLEGO EL PRODUCTO
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: NO ME LLEGO MI PEDIDO Y SI ME LO FACTURARON, Y AHORA NO ME AYUDAN A RESOLVER EL PROBLEMA!!!

author: Fernandman
title: Brand new watch for 50$ lower than retail
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I was kinda skeptical at first that this would be a refurbished watch or opened one but when It got delivered it was brand new with all the wrapping around it. The only thing that might be a problem for some would be that it did not come with a charging “brick” for the wall. No problem for me though since ive accumulated a ton. Battery life has lasted 3 days on a full charge so far and Ive used it in workouts and tracks steps gps data and heartrate very well. Havent tried the waterproof feature but I dont plan on wearing it near water anyway since apple doesnt cover water damage in any warranty

author: ariel
title: Watch is awsome
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: So when I ordered this I order the white band and silver case but I got the black and gray one.... other then that this watch is amazing!! I love it!

author: S. Turner
title: Highly Recommend!!!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I bought this watch on Black Friday and got THE BEST DEAL! No other store or website  had the watch priced lower! It was brand new and I was still able to add Apple Care+ after my purchase! Love this watch! I didn’t want to pay a monthly service fee for it because really, I’m  always going to have my phone on me. I’m still able to use it to make phone calls, text, check email, get my social media updates and lots more! When I’m at home or at the office, I can still move between rooms (without my phone) without Losing service! So glad I didn’t waste money on buying a watch with a cellular plan!

author: Bill
title: Please buy Apple Care + As a screen repair is crazy expensive.
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I don’t need to say anything more about how fantastic this watch is. I was a garmin forerunner holdout for years and finally switched as I wanted a watch to listen to music with while running. The only negative thing I can say about this watch is battery life but I knew that before purchasing it. My solution was using the watch in nightstand mode at night and it’s always charged for a full day of activity.  Please note by doing this u can’t use the watch to track sleep but that’s not an issue as i have never had a need to track sleep. I get about 3.5 miles of running in a day and with GPS, heart rate and music playback on and I still have not dipped below 30 percent battery life by the time i take it off to charge at night. The only thing I miss about the garmin ecosystem is the ability to track mileage on my gear/shoes.The reason I am writing a review is to urge u to by Apple Care +. It’s 2.49 a month or 49 dollars for two years of coverage and no I am not associated with Apple. I am just a crazy active person getting about 20k steps a day.I was wearing the watch yesterday while edging the fence line with my gas trimmer. I rolled my ankle on a slope and fell into the fence. The angle must have been just right and hit the upper left corner of the watch off the fence post shattering the screen.I was shocked to find that the cost of the screen replacement on the watch is the exact price I bought it for from amazon. It’s 229. With Apple Care + the cost comes down to 69 dollars. With the care plan u are covered for two years from date of purchase and they allow for two accidental damage repairs over the life of the policy. The only catch is u have to add the plan within 60 days of purchase.That’s all I have to say. I used to say AirPods were the most innovative thing Apple has done in ages but now I feel it’s the watch. Apple pay even more amazing on the watch and being able to voice respond to Tex’s is killer since Apple keeps iMessages locked down to their devices only for the time being.

author: April P.
title: It arrived earlier than what was first promised.
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: It connected and started up right away. No issues. love the look and feel. I didn't realize they send an extra band that is a bigger size. That was nice because I need the larger size band so I changed to it.

author: Hatpinsally
title: Love It!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I wasn't sure if I wanted an Apple watch because I was not sure of the usage I would get from it. However, since purchasing it, I have been extremely happy with it. It is nice to be able to not have my phone on me (if I am within Bluetooth range which is a small range, but doable if you leave your phone in your purse and have to walk around an office). I am able to check and respond to texts, Messenger messages, and emails, and there are multiple features which allow you to silence the phone or put it on Do Not Disturb (just like the iPhone). Most of all, however, I love that the watch tracks my activity. I am not a fitness buff and I did not really have an interest in tracking my heart rate and steps throughout the day, however, it is fun to look at the statistics and set goals. I also like the, "Breathe," feature which coaches you through a minute of breathing--it helps you cool down and forces you to take a short break from life.Long story short: I thought I would regret purchasing this and that it would be a waste of money, but I am extremely happy that I did. I utilize it more than I thought I would and I love all of the features on it.

author: Brendon McCaslin
title: Great Watch, Came In Brand New Condition.
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Pros:Great FitComfortableEasy To UseLooks Amazing2 Day Battery LifeEasy SetupText Messaging, Calling, Music, Fitness, and Weather Apps Are All Easy To UseLots Of Fun To UseVery Quick Load Up Time On AppsCame Is Perfect ConditionWater Proof ModeVery ConvenientCons:There Is Not A Lot Of Cons I Can Put About This Product Right Now.38mm Is Small For People With Big WristsScreen Scratches and Gets Dirty Pretty EasilyComments:In Total I Love This Watch I’m Always Wearing With It’s Great Looks And Convenience. The 38mm Is Perfect For People With Small Wrist, But a Little Small For People With Big Wrist.This Came In Brand New In Perfect Condition In The Same Box And Everything. This Watch Has 2 Day Battery Life Which In My Opinion Is Ok It Could Be Better. I Would Recommend This To Anyone Thinking About Buying This.

author: Amazon Customer
title: amazing
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: i never thought i would get an apple watch, but wanting to add some tracking/encouragement to working out, i went for it. i also swim, so that was a big seller for me. i am SO happy with this watch. simple to use and works great. charge always last me at least a full day, if not 2. i got a Velcro strap for it, but the one it comes with is fine and comfortable. the tracking is accurate, and the swimming tracking is insane. it tracks each specific strokes (free, back, ect) distance you go for the workout which i am so happy with. love the product and highly recommend. for being a generation behind, it is still incredible.

author: bentley
title: Great smart watch, used mostly as a fitness tracker
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I use this watch primarily for its fitness/workout functions and tracking, and it has done a great job of tracking my heartrate and workouts.  I wish the battery would last longer, a single 60 minute workout with constant heart tracking consumes about 10-20% of the battery life.  Have to charge about every two days.

author: tlorn
title: LOVE IT!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: It’s exactly as described!Brand new and box was sealed!Best price!It’s replacing my Fitbit Versa.There is no comparison even though Fitbit has been wonderful to me.Nothing beats Apples display, size, functionality, etc.

author: Amazon Customer
title: I don’t think it’s new
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: It seems to be running great.  They described it as new.. but it has a year + of someone’s workout on it.

author: Andre Suero
title: Works Great
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Battery Life is not the best. Last me around 12-16 hours per day. Besides that everything works great!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Tiny wrist friendly!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I have super tiny wrists and this fit better than the ones I tried on in store! Very pleased with this purchase.

author: Cam
title: Series 3 became more affordable
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Once the series 4 came out, and with the holiday deals, I’m happy to have received the new pricing and opportunity to get the series 3 watch.  I’ve never really liked any type of digital watch, since analog hands were just more desirable to me. . This gadget is more useful than any watch ever. Finally, tech to be happy to wear, and swapping the face is a great feature.

author: Alexis Romanko
title: Love it so far!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I am a Fitbit person. But I decided to slurge a little bit...... The only think that kept me from switching was that I had to charge the watch so much more. I originally had the Fitbit charge 2...... then I purchased the series 3 (42mm) and I love this watch but it was just far too big. So I am returning the 42mm and just received the 38mm and am much happier with the size. I wanted to really share the size difference. I love this watch so far... will review in the future.

author: Jose C.
title: It is fast and battery is okay
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I had the 1st generation Apple Watch and it felt SUPER slow! So decided to buy the 3rd generation and I am glad I did, it is FAR FAR more reliable and quick to perform what you ask it to do. The battery if used normally it lasts me 3 days. Absolutely best watch ever.

author: Christina Woods
title: If I could give this product 6 Stars I would
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I never write reviews on products... ever!! but this is the most satisfied I've even been with a product that I've purchased online. I order the 38mm white Apple watch and it was so perfect, even came sealed in a brand new apple watch box. It came with two different sets of wrist bands as well as a charger. Definitely worth the money. Would recommend to anyone skeptical.

author: MC.S
title: Slow and overpriced even at new low prices
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I am very underwhelmed with my first Apple Watch.Coming from a Fitbit Alta HR, my first impressions are that the battery life is much worse, it doesn't track your sleep and doesn't have alarms (that I've been able to find) to wake you up. It also requires daily charging and the only charging cable is too cumbersome to carry around.While I will be keeping it because the find my iPhone button comes in handy and the reminders to practice deep breathing are nice, I wish I had held out for a newer version of the watch.

author: harlem
title: Great watch
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I am a watch wearer and this has replaced all of my watches. I haven't used the full functionality of the watch but I primarily use it to workout. It tracks my workout progress and calories better than the workout apps I used. I haven't showered in it so I'm not sure how well it holds up in water but I do swear a lot when I workout and I've never noticed a difference in the way it functions. It is hard to use when your fingers are wet but that would be the case with any touch screen device. I don't often use the speaker on the watch itself when I'm talking on the phone but when I do, the people on the other end hear me clearly and I hear them clearly. Paring my phone and airpods to the watch was a simple and easy step.

author: Joseph Steven Guerrero
title: Great Apple Watch!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: So far it’s great! Love all the features the Apple Watch comes with especially the message speech to text!

author: lourdes jimenez
title: Perfect product and the best price
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I really liked that it came completely new without any type of mistake, it comes completely sealed, works great as it should... honestly I don't have any sort of complain about it since the watch works perfectly, does what is intended and connected to my phone with no problem.

author: Mykle Lape
title: Worth the money
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves it. It is an amazing product and makes a terrific gift!

author: Alex M.
title: Never thought I’d own one but I love it
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: My job doesn’t allow cell phones at work, that being said I can read and respond to texts very quickly and no one knows. It also sends me alerts about my fitness,  I found it annoying and furnished but it surprisingly motivates me to put in that extra 10 minutes to meet my fitness goal

author: Texas Camille
title: Love this watch!!!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I have been wanting one for a while and purchased it right before it went on sale (boo hoo) but I am enjoying it every much. I bought it for the health and activity features but love the fact I can read and respond to a text message on it, get weather updates and control my music. I wanted the newer one with the blood pressure monitoring but that will have to wait for now. Great entry level Apple Watch. If you're on the fence about spending the money on a watch, go ahead and try this one out. I think you will be very pleased with it.

author: Buttercup's mommy
title: LOVE my new iWatch
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I transitioned from a Fitbit to an iWatch and boy, was the difference HUGE! I love the interactivity and synchronization with your iPhone. It took me a short minute to figure out the difference but the fact that I can answer calls without having to pull out the phone while its near me is so helpful and also pretty cool :) Overall, it's an awesome product by Apple and would recommend it to all! Totally worth it.

author: Raz
title: Great watch but FRAGILE! (And too expensive to fix)
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Great watch but sadly not very durable. All the features are up to par with Apple products but the screen is extremely susceptible to cracking even with the slightest bump. Had it for a month before a small bump against a wall created a crack across the face horizontally; the touch screen does not function at all now. Apple repair is $289, which is more than the cost of the watch! Highly recommend getting a protective case for this due to the poor screen durability.

author: Shelley B
title: I love my new watch!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I received a great deal and finally took the jump and purchased this Series 3.  I am so glad I did.  I thought the band was very comfortable however the smaller section was just a smidge too tight and caused some sweating underneath.  I switched to the longer version and voila!  Great fit!  I love it that you can buy and replace the bands so easily.  I have three more coming with a case (highly recommend a case).  I'm afraid of bumping it and cracking the screen so I ordered a case just for that reason.  The repair costs is the same as a new watch!  I don't want that!  The battery life seems ok for me, and the apps seem to work flawlessly.  So many options to customize the watch!  LOVE IT!

author: c.j.
title: It's $50 less on Amazon...cool!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: It's a brand new Series 3 Apple Watch being sold for $50 less than on the Apple site and arrived same day on a holiday (vs. 2 business days from Apple)...so I'm pretty thrilled with those variances. As far as the product goes...it's an Apple Watch. It isn't a necessity but it does link intuitively with an iPhone and serves as a decent fitness tracker. I have had a Series 1 for 3.5 years and it still works great. This Series 3 was a purchase for my wife and there are some improvements, but the only reason I'd replace a perfectly functioning Series 1 with the Series 3 is if I did serious swimming or wanted to wear while surfing. In short, if you don't already have an Apple Watch and you are on the fence - buy this one.

author: Recsolstice589
title: Not as fitness focused as I was wanting
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Love the watch. Still trying to figure out the fitness specs. Not as fitness savvy as my old Fitbit as I was expecting.

author: steph. S
title: Great deal
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Got the 42mm black Apple Watch for 229. Best Buy and Apple had it for around 279-300, so I’m glad I went to amazon! Got it on time, came in the original Apple packaging, brand new. I’m so happy with the watch itself but also satisfied with the price I got it for.

author: Noble Z
title: 2 weeks and Malfunctioning...
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I love the watch. It helps me be on my phone less and has gotten me to be a bit more active. It's a great quality of life gadget. Unfortunately, the screen started to malfunction after 3 weeks of light use! When I look at the watch, it looks as if someone is rapidly swiping up and down and attempting to press all the buttons rapidly. The thing goes completely haywire and I am forced to restart it for a temporary fix.Amazon is sending me a replacement so I'm really hoping this one was a bad seed.

author: Sounds good
title: I love it and I can’t say that enough!!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Don’t know why I didn’t get this earlier. I had been buying all these other brands of smart watches and they ended up breaking and then I’ll buy another one and then another one. Wasted money away and then finally decided to spend a little more to buy Apple Watch. I have been missing out a whole lot. This is the watch I should have bought years ago. It has everything I need and more. It’s the smart of the smartest of the sports watches. Tracking my activity and everything else is here. If you haven’t bought one yet, you’re really missing out.The only thing  I don’t really like is the battery life is poor. I have to charge it every day. Hey but I don’t mind doing that.

author: Cookie
title: USP adaptor
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I just received my watch and I'm happy with it.  I see the website says it includes a power adapter however it seems that Apple perhaps stopped including them?  The box is too flat for one to fit.  That being said, I called Amazon and an agent agreed to send me one at no charge.  Amazon sells them for $15 so if you don't receive it, give them a call.  I suggested that they change the listing if in fact none of them include adapters.  The price is great (even without the adapter).  This is an upgrade from a Series 1 and it seems faster and the screen is brighter.

author: TuNeS-JR
title: Phenomenal I love it got so my compliments already!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I love it brand new right out of the box very easy to set up in a heart beat it’s remarkable and at this price your getting your money’s worth hands down it’s brand new right out of the box don’t listen to the negativity trust me it’s all legitimate you will love it as we all do!! Get it now like today if your getting this series 3 watch you will not find a better price anywhere!!

author: jl hodges
title: Love it
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Like all Apple products I love it easy to use easy to setupI traded from a Fitbit Ionic to this watch no issues with my Fitbit but I have an iPhone and iPad figured must have the watchMy only complaint so far is battery life can barely get 24 hrs on it I know it does more than my Fitbit did but I was getting 3 or 4 days on a charge with itGuess I may half to turn off some options to see if it lasts longer

author: Tfroggy
title: I love it, only had it about two weeks though
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I love having my text messages on my wrist when I'm not near my phone.  I got this to replace my fitbit which I was having problems with.  So far it works great.  I don't know about water resistance because I'm trying my best to keep it away from water.  Sweat doesn't seem to bother it though.  I don't love that you have to get a separate app to track your sleep, but its an apple product, you seem to have to have a separate app for everything.

author: Ashley Randazzo
title: Very sleek design and great product all together
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: My husband loves his Apple Watch and wears it every day. Battery life for the both of us is about 2 days before we have to sit it on the charger. We don’t shower with ours on but it seems to hold up great when washing our hands and things like that. I’m sure it would be fine in the shower but it’s juer a personal performance not to for us.

author: Josh Cox
title: Iwatch was locked and I can not use it.
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Product was activation locked. It is not useable.

author: Maria Campos
title: loving it
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I wasn't sure if i was going to like this. but surprisingly i do. i am so happy i bought it through here then through my carrier. very happy with this. it does come with a charger just not the adapter. the battery life is amazing. I've gone days without charging it. i have an extra adapter so charging isn't an issue. even if i didn't i would just switch it out when my phone is done. i receive my messages and phone calls. i love it

author: Avry Byington
title: Great gift idea for my daughter
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: My daughter was soo happy and excited to receive the apple watch. It works perfect makes a great gift and she actually texts me right back now! She loves all the features.

author: Paul McCarthy
title: Exactly what I wanted
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: LOVE IT had no idea it came with a small/medium band and a medium/large band 👌🏻

author: Asher
title: They are overpriced
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Yes apple is bad

author: Kelsey M
title: Exactly what I was looking for!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I went back and forth between getting an Apple Watch or a Fitbit. I’m so happy with the Apple Watch. I love that it connects to my phone so easily. Looking forward to using the built in GPS to track runs outside. Also love that I’m able to read and respond to texts from the watch as I don’t always have my phone by me. Only 2 stars for battery because mine keeps dying or I wake up to less than 10% battery after it being charged fully the day before. I’ve made some setting adjustments so hopefully fix this issue.

author: Fabio Martínez
title: Excelente
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Fue en regalo de cumpleaños de mi novia y le encanto, tuve varios problemas con este articulo y mi banco pero ya esas son cosas que se salen de las manos del vendedor.

author: L. Shuenn
title: Modern and nice looking
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Got this on sale and was very happy about it. Screen was bright and sharp. Connects well with my Iphone 6S plus.I hope it will last at least 2 years or more before upgrading.

author: James Festa
title: Apple phone software compatibility
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Spent 2 hours at Apple Story to connect to watch.  Had to buy an Apple XR Iphone to get it to function.

author: L. Curtiss
title: BETTER THAN I THOUGHT!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I put off getting the apple watch for a couple of years thinking it wouldn't be "all that". I recently bought the fitbit versa that was all the rage at Christmas. It was hailed as better than the apple watch by some. Obviously those people never had an apple watch. The fitbit quit on me after a month so I went ahead and got the apple series 3 watch.It is in a whole different league than the fitbit versa and I paid almost the same for the apple watch as the fitbit. This watch is amazing!

author: Oscar S.
title: Great deal
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I had a really good deal . I can’t be happier .

author: reeraaroo
title: Don't Buy from Amamzon; sending defective returns as "new"
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Bought Tuesday, has not worked properly once, lots of trouble shooting. Knew when I received my "new" item that it was obviously a return. That is how the world works, I guess, but it was also defective, and that isn't how the world works. Stop doing shady stuff like this, it gives your companies a bad name. Wish I could return it,  but I lost part of the band, so I am stuck with a nothing more than a kids toy.

author: Kylea
title: Not a single regret
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I've been eyeing my coworkers watch for over six months now, and finally decided to take the plunge. ZERO regrets. This has been so great at work. I can check my messages real quick and manage my phone without whipping out of my pocket. My screen usage even went down 60%. It's freeing!My only sadness is not getting the cellular version, but I still have my Iphone 5, so that wasn't an option unless i was going to upgrade that as well.

author: Jimbo
title: Upgraded my Fitbit
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Pros: has a lot more functions than other fitness watches.Cons: the battery needs to be charged basically daily.I had a Fitbit Blaze prior to this and while I liked it, it felt like a single purpose item. I opted for the series 3 over the 4 because the cost savings was so significant that I didn't feel I needed the ECG. I also do pre-paid cellular so the cellular watch wasn't an option (only post-paid and the big 3 are currently supported from my understanding).

author: Justin L.
title: Amazing
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Love Apple and this beautiful watch!

author: TL Palm Bay
title: Great deal!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Decided to upgrade from FitBit to Apple Watch and caught a great deal of the Apple Watch Series 3.  I found it easy to set up and get to tracking. I did have to read up on how to use the buttons and all at first, but caught on easily.  Love being able to access my Apps on the watch if the phone is not right by me.  Got the smaller case, but it is still easy to ready and do things on.  Just got it, so no ratings yet for the battery life, or water resistance.  Still learning and playing around with the watch face and settings.

author: Armando Reyes
title: Great Gift!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: This was a gift for my GF, she loves it. I took advantage of a heavy discount for the 42mm, I wish I bought 2 instead of 1.It's pretty fast and it has almost all the functions the series 4 does. The screen size on the 42mm is ideal, specially for those who has difficulty reading small letters.The series 4 is not a worthy upgrade unless you value the ECG and more screen area. Other than these 2 "features", you can have the same experience with the series 3 by almost half the price.

author: Terri Giese
title: Love these!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Love these bands Mary and expensive very comfortable I love the variety of colors. I have gotten several and change them out frequently because it’s so easy.

author: Jalisa
title: You will need case and adapter to charge your watch.
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I was a little hesitant about ordering this Apple Watch, only because there was some bad reviews. I am glad to say I LOVE MY NEW Apple Watch. I would recommend that anyone thinking of ordering get a shock-free case! Especially when you are not use to wearing an Apple Watch( you will be amazed at how many time you hit you wrist). It can perfect wrapped with an extra adjustable band and charger cord but the box didn’t contain the adapter pieces

author: Amit Nayak
title: Its Apple Watch!!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Like these as I own all apple products and was missing this. Got this for a thanksgiving deal. Worth the money as all the other companies charge close to $200. Like the activities rings . Battery lasts for upto 2 dats but can be increased with theatre mode when on trip

author: Joshua A.
title: Watch comes as described!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: This product was phenomenal. To me it took kinda long but only because I was so eager. I’m fully satisfied and happy. When it arrived, the box was in mint condition & it felt like I bought it from the Apple store. Everything was in one piece and so clean. I messed up the box cause it got stuck with some glue from a tab I wasn’t supposed to take off but I was so angry, that’s how neat the box was. Kudos to the seller and success on any future sales!

author: Cheryl
title: Best Deal!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I really love this for keeping track of my workouts and health and for this to only be about 2 years old, the price was awesome! The new ones are cool but there’s not a HUGE difference between this and the series 4 except the price. As a college student, I’d recommend it especially if you’re already in the Apple ecosystem and want to keep track of things like health and having little alerts without always being on your phone.

author: Lindsey
title: Great watch but read if you're on the edge
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: great watch not many things wron with it if you're thinking about a series 2 i would get this because of the stuff they added and how much better the 3 is but the 4 is much alike this one so dont spend the extra money on the 4Great watch

author: Scotty
title: Bought this as a gift
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: It is really nice.  I think the battery life should be a little better but I understand that is what happens when apps are not closed.  My friend doesn't mind charging it every couple of days.  I got to play with the watch some and it is pretty great.  Using it to answer his iPhone sounds pretty good too.

author: Grace
title: Buy the dang watch!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: If you’ve been thinking about buying this for yourself but you haven’t because of the $$.... BUY IT! You definitely don’t need it. But you will be so excited about all the insanely cool features. You will also look very stylish with all the different bands you can get. You’ll get tons of compliments on it. Hop on the bandwagon.Seriously, talking to Siri is a breeze. I use the timer often (for workouts or cooking). Pinging your iPhone is a lifesaver. I could go on. This was a prize to myself for getting a new job and I don’t regret one cent! So happy with it!

author: Fausto Santana
title: Producto incompleto
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: El articulo llego incompleto, los componentes de la caja no son los que se describen.

author: Anne levin
title: I love my apple watch
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: So easy to read the time - I am trying to learn how to use all the features, but the best thing is when I am walking with my phone in my purse and it rings - so does my watch and I can answer the call and talk on my watch. I love that feature.

author: Mark
title: COMPLETELY WORTHLESS
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I CAN'T EVEN GET THE DAMN THING TO PAIR WITH MY PHONE.  DEFINITELY GOT RIPPED OFF HERE.  COMPLETELY WORTHLESS.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome product
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: My husband absolutely loves his watch. It doesn’t come with a screen protector so we had to buy that separate.

author: Zack Rose
title: Functions functions functions
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: It’s more than a fashion statement. The functionality of the watch plays more than one role. I lose my phone and have the ability to ping for it to make a quick and easy find. I’m always updated with my current messages and who might be calling when my phone is not in hand. The fitness aspect is fun even though I’m not a gym buff. Overall this was a good investment of my money. Looking forward to upgrading in the future.

author: Steph
title: You won’t regret buying it!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I love it. It’s super easy to setup and I love all the different options. I got it for exercise but reading and responding to messages is huge. Battery can last about 2-2.5 days with no charge. I purposefully bought the 3 not 4 because I didn’t need the cell plan and I’m not missing anything! Also came in brand new box from apple (I know that worries some people).

author: Paul
title: Price and shipping
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Great price and fast shipping, this will be a Christmas present so will not be able to see it in action until the 25

author: PapaBear
title: Very happy with this purchase!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: First let me say I’m a 5’11 male 320lbs with a 10in wrist and this watch fits easy with the large band that comes in the box as well as a smaller band for smaller folks. I am very pleased with this buy and recommend it to others and last my watch came brand new never opened.

author: Keith W. Harris
title: Another great Apple tech toy
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: My son received this for his 13th birthday and he loves it: using it for his alarms and reminders, texting with his friends, tracking his steps, and even *gasp* checking the time! Personally I don't have a need for one product to tell me to pay attention to another product but if you're a gizmo kind of person, it has its charm.

author: Rene Gordon
title: Great product, but battery won't go a whole two days
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Battery life is less than expected.  Some reviews had indicated it could go 2 days.  I would say you can get a solid day and a half at most.  I don't mind charging everyday, but I was a little disappointed in the short battery life.  But hey, it goes about as far as my phone, so I can live with it.Love it!

author: asurkyn89
title: Love it!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: LOVEEEEE my watch! I haven’t had any issues with it at all and I wear it daily. I’ve worn it for 12+ hours at a time without it dying. Was in mint condition! Shipping took longer then it was supposed too so that was disappointing. I was leaving to go out of town and paid extra for it to be here before I left but it took longer to ship then it was supposed to. But very satisfied with the product itself.

author: Elderon Love
title: Endless opportunities
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I absolutely love this watch! The amount of specs and opportunities are endless. Just when I think I've discovered everything about this watch, I find more. The GPS version allows you to call as long as your phone is within 33 ft, which was surprising because I wasn't sure if it allowed cellular abilities at all. This watch is perfect for athletic or busy individuals.

author: popwin
title: wonderful product!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: it works great! only complain is it only works with iphone! not even ipad...(

author: Gillian
title: love it!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I have no complaints on my watch.I bought it three months ago and i LOVE it. When i first purchased it, i was afraid that i would regret it, but i havnt, and would buy it again in a heart beat.|My favorite features include tracking my physical activity, find my phone, and the ability to text through it. I use them all the time. I also like that you are about to set up your phone and take the photo using my watch. Its very helpful.10/10 would recommend

author: Gina
title: Easy to use
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Cool product but I realized I'm not a watch person and having a big chunk of metal on my wrist just made me feel odd.  But the product is good and would suggest it to anyone that loves electronics.  Only problem now is waiting on the refund to kick in.  It's been more than 7 days and I still haven't received any information on refund when I see the package was delivered.

author: Chrissa Elsberry
title: Let me tell you what I love about Amazon
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I originally purchased the Apple Watch in February.  Within a few weeks, the microphone, dictation, talk to text feature, stopped working.  I contacted Amazon and without hesitation, they sent a replacement watch.  New one works great so far.  Absolutely pleased with everything.  I haven't tested the water resistance yet (honestly it scares me to get it wet) but battery life is great and it's easy to use.  Love this watch.  And love Amazon!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Hands Free!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I love my Apple watch. I was skeptical at first when I was deciding to buy one just because I wasn't sure how often I would use it. Now that I have had a few weeks to break it in... I LOVE IT!!!I am a new mom and I hate that being on my phone a ton makes my baby want my phone all the time so being hands-free is crucial and convenient which is a huge factor when it came to picking between a fit bit and apple watch. I love that I can answer my phone while trying to change a diaper or make a bottle!! Everything else is great too but that is the best part for me :)

author: Logan Bartels
title: Great!!!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I love it, works really good and looks good too!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Mostly great.
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I love my watch. It’s taken me a few days to get it all figured out.A con though, I went to the app to look at an exercise I did and saw four exercises from October 2018 (I bought the watch last week.). So basically I think I got a refurbished watch sold at the retail price. I’m not too happy about that but it works fine so I guess that’s a good thing.

author: Roxie Baker
title: Saved a Life
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: My son loves his watch. He has severe asthma and his watch saved him from getting worse. This watch has many amazing features and was offered at an affordable price. I am grateful I ordered it from Amazon. It arrived in a timely manner and it looked awesome once it made it to my house. It is worth the investment.

author: Rachel Quintans
title: Excellent wAtch. Mommy’s best friend
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I will update as I continue to use it. So far, it is very intuitive as it works with my iPhone X really well. I did my research before purchasing.My favorites:The breathe appFitness trackerNot being tied to my phone!Vibrations for notifications

author: Britney McVicker
title: Love it!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I have only had this a few days and I love it. I am using it a lot and even for sleep tracking so I was concerned with battery life. Not only does the battery last a lot longer than I expected, it charges even faster!

author: joyce
title: Grat price for great value
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I bought it last Black Friday at $229. You can complain about anything about this price. I love it so much. I am not a watch person and I rarely wear a watch. I love this watch so much since it will track my exercises every day even I am swimming.

author: Julie Richards
title: love it
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: use it mostly for health/fitness tracking. I know there are a ton of features that i dont take advantage of but everything i've tried or use is great. Havent had any issues with it yet.

author: Sarah Bruno
title: Great Watch!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I love my Apple Watch! It works great, tracks my activity, can read my text messages from the screen and set daily goals. This watch is not on a cellular plan but works through Bluetooth. I love it!

author: Joel A. Faulkner
title: Apple Watch sucks.
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Hoped for something that worked.  Received it today  Took an hour to pair.  Unable to change the band at this point. Too small. The release will not let go.  Lots of money for crap.  Keep looking.

author: Daniel Lazzaro
title: Good deal and great gift
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Got a great deal on this one I Black Friday. Wasn’t sure I would like it or find uses for it. After a few weeks I have completely gotten rid of my Fitbit. This does so much more. Love it.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Very comfortable!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I have tiny wrists so normally I have a hard time finding bands that fit. This band has been amazing! Going on two months and I have no desire to switch it out. I use it for work and the gym and it has been very comfortable and holds up extremely well! Would definitely purchase again.

author: Stephanie rupani
title: It is a great watch.
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I originally got this watch to do the walkie talkie with my friends. I like that you can walkie talkie anyone of your friends no matter where you or they are. It’s nice not to have your phone with you and still be able to answer calls or texts.

author: Danya
title: So far so good! I Love it!
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I was really debating whether or not I needed this watch. Truth is , I love it! I work with children and I can’t really be on my phone which makes this watch perfect for me! I purchased the 42mm , after reading many reviews that the face was too big, I still decided to try it. I compared it to my friends 38mm and the difference isn’t much !

author: Marcus
title: Amazing product
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: This Apple Watch really changes how you live your daily life. It’s very convenient to have to send a quick text or to check out your heart rate! I love how you can download a bunch of apps that are compatible with the watch itself. Highly recommend getting this for anybody! :)

author: Anonymous
title: Light weight
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Brought it As a gift for my daughter who is a kindergarten teacher. she is unable to have her phone with her therefor this watch allows her an opportunity to keep in communication with family friends and what’s going on around her

author: Jake
title: Disappointed
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: It worked perfectly for 2 weeks. Now the screen is unresponsive. I contacted Amazon and the only option I have is getting a refund and returning the watch. I really want another Apple Watch, but they are out of stock. So upsetting.

author: Stan
title: Great upgrade
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Faster than the previous series 0,1, and 2. Connects faster and turns on in about 10-15 seconds. Fully submersible in clear water not salt water.

author: Steve T
title: Great Product
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Stylish and functional. I don’t use for much more than activity tracking and to pair my Bluetooth headphones with at the gym so the Series 3 (which I got on a Black Friday sale) does the job just great for a reasonable price.

author: Speed Freak
title: Perfect gift for a young lady
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Excellent Apple quality as always.. My daughter LOVES the watch. She works flawless and and synched up with her account perfectly.

author: Dhoffman
title: Really fun
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Really like this watch. The band is so comfortable and really stays put. I bought one for my 12 year old and it fits her small wrist too. Changing out the bands is so fun and easy.

author: jackie
title: Extremely impressed
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Purchased this item for 16 year old grandson. He said when he puts it on it's like a birthday present everyday! It has reached beyond all expectations!! Thanks for a great item.

author: Bumble bee
title: Wow
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I love it. It arrived brand new, so easy to use and now I couldn’t go to work without it as I always check the activity and my heart beat. I can easily read those who message me via sms or other social media networks. I bought the 38mm cmbecause I’m skinny and I’m glad I did. Fits perfect.

author: kamgrn
title: Buy this watch!
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: What a deal!  Watch comes in factory box and wrapping - as if buying from Apple directly.  Highly recommended. I love my new watch!

author: Nina Smith
title: Helpful and motivating
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Best invention ever. I use my phone less now. It’s great because my phone can suck me into it most of the time. Keeps me off of it. It’s so helpful and motivating me to move!

author: A. Baruch
title: Wife loves it
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: My wife really likes it - Made changes in her daily routine to make the watch "happy" lol. All about hitting daily goals

author: caterina
title: Love love love
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: After using a fit bit for so long and returning the 1st Apple Watch I got years back, I am so happy I made the switch!!

author: Kevin W Moore
title: Anyone can figure it out
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: As always Apple comes thru. Easy to sync, easy to use. The person I bought it for doesn’t read instructions yet she has it working perfectly. Amazingly the thing even knows which swimming stroke she used. Pricey but it works well and I don’t have to figure it out and explain some complex thing.

author: Laurie Berkedal
title: Charging issues
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Having trouble getting it ti charge fully?  I’ve read online this can be a problem with the Apple watch.Suggestions?

author: MVS
title: Fragile Watch Very Expensive to Repair
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: I received the watch as a Birthday present in October. I liked the health and fitness tracking features. In December while on a hike my wrist banged in to a tree and the screen cracked. I just went to the Apple store to get it repaired and I was told that it would cost $229 plus tax to get it repaired or replaced. For that price, I will throw it out . Buyer beware, this watch is extremely fragile and expensive to repair. It is not good for an active person who enjoys the outdoors.

author: Amazon Customer
title: If you are active in any way at all this is not the product for you
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: Had the watch for 4 months paid for with hard earned money.Read all of the reviews and the ads from Apple made it sound like it was pretty durable. I actually did a lot of research on this before buying asking random people that had the watch if they liked it and inquired about it.Seriously asking random strangers for input. Asking if they felt it was durable and wouldn't break easily.They all told me yes it was a good product and worth the investment.  Flash forward 4 months later, 4months, removing the watch at night to put on the charger like I have done for the past 4 months. It slipped out of my hand and fell. It fell not even 3 feet and hit the floor.  I glanced at it briefly and it seemed fine.  Go to put it on in the morning and I notice a hair line crack. Upon closer inspection I see that the whole screen is cracked and a chip exists in the lower corner. Oh crap, We have the insurance with the service provider hopefully it is covered. No chance, the insurance for devices is a poor investment for the record.  Ok, maybe I can take it to Apple and see if they can fix it and explore my options couldn't be too much they will stand up behind their product. If I explain, after all they advertise that is for an active lifestyle, clearly a 3 foot drop should not have caused damage like this.  Wrong, basically if you are active in any way this watch will break and Apple will not step up on this.They informed me that I could buy a new watch for $400 and send this one in for repair. After the watch is repaired then I could return it for full refund.  Hmm interesting, as if I have $400 laying around for something like this, it was suggested that I "float" the cost somehow.  So then I ask, How much will the repair be? They said $268, after the visit i was informed on 1-800-MYA-PPLE. The repair is $289.  A repair to a $400 watch which I have had for 4 months that broke from a 3 foot fall to the floor. Spend $289 to fix it and "float" $400 for a temporary replacement. author: Morgan
title: Apple Watch Series 3: 42mm
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: There are many great reasons to purchase the apple watch. When looking at the other sport fitness watches, I took in consideration, the price and quality of the watch. Then asked myself, what I would use the watch for and how much I would use it. The main consideration on why I wanted a fitness watch was to track my fitness. I have always enjoyed being active. I believe even if you aren’t active, they are still very beneficial for all kinds of people.Fitness Components of the Apple WatchThe watch, fitness wise, is able to track your calories, steps, heart beat and how many times you stand up in a day. It allows you to set your own fitness goals and customize them based around you. This setting holds you accountable. You receive daily notifications, every morning you put your watch on telling you how many rings you closed throughout the day, you also receive a weekly and monthly notification telling you how miles you walked and calories you burned.Another setting that is super cool is, the watch is water proof. If you are a swimmer or enjoy swimming it will allow you to swim with your watch on and tracks everything for you. I thought this setting was really so cool. I have tried it multiple times in the water and every time after I am done, my watch works just the same afterwards. The watch also allows you to download different fitness apps, making it capable to do all different kinds of workouts.Other Components of the Apple WatchThe watch does a lot more than just track your fitness. You are able to connect your phone to your watch through Bluetooth, making it so you don’t have to have your phone right on you. Your phone can be in the other room and you are still able to make/accept phone calls allowing you talk to the person from your watch, send/receive text messages, set alarms, events, check various social medias, download basically any app on your watch and its very customizable. You are able to switch out the bands to whatever color and style you want, change the wallpaper and look of your screen and set a lock on your watch. You can really make your watch, your watch.If you are thinking about what fitness watch to buy, I would highly recommend the apple watches. You are capable of doing so much and making the watch your own.

author: Taylor Berns
title: Many excellent features can help with hands-free tasks'
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: As an individual who frequents the gym I was interested in purchasing a smart watch to help digitally track my progress. Upon careful consideration, I chose to purchase a Series 3, 32 mm, space grey smartwatch from Apple. The sleek design allows for a comfortable fit on your wrist. The Apple Watch includes many features that allow you to track your health, meet your fitness goals, and remain hands-free. With the stand, move, and exercise rings feature you are able to track your workout, how many calories you’re burning, the number of minutes of you’ve completed, and how long you’ve been idle. Your heart rate can also be detected and the watch will let you know if your heart rate has dropped too low or has reached and unusually high rate. The water resistant feature helps to protect the watch from water or sweat damage.A few other pros to this watch are as follows:• Make and receive calls and text messages• Receive notifications from other apps such as Gmail, Facebook, Twitter, etc.• Interchangeable bands by size and color• Hands-free Siri• Alarms, reminders, calendar and notes• Apple Music or Spotify synched to your iPhone• Safety feature that includes ability to call an emergency service with the hold of a buttonOne downfall I have found is that the watch doesn’t hold a charge for long if you don’t have it on power reserve mode. It also loses power if you are not wearing it and it is not connected to the charging device. Overall, I am happy with my purchase and would recommend this product to others searching for a smart watch to digitally track your exercise, as well as use for many other daily uses.

title: Apple Watch vs Fit bit
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: Here’s the deal. I like Apple products but I am definitely not an Apple acolyte. I refuse to buy a Mac but I like an iphone over an adroid.ask yourself what you want in wearable tech. If you want just a fitness tracker Fitbit is a much cheaper option and you can still get notifications and text messages. I bought this product because i needed a quick reference device for notifications and communications that also can track fitness. Makes sense? It’s a flip from fitbit.My former Fitbit’s battery lasted 3-5 days. My apple watch will last two days before going to 0%. However, if im not working out or receiving alot of texts, i have stretched it out to 3 days before 0% battery.It is very durable. It was recently cold soaked for two hours in a very heavy rain storm and still keeps on ticking without any glitches. It’s been banged around a few times and no scratches thus far. If you want to buy a face protector go ahead but i feel they make you feel like you need one to get more money out of you. And if you do buy a screen protector, dont get cheap cuz then they are just getting money of you with little return for your small investment.(Do yourself a favor and read up on the durability of cell phone, and smart watch, screens. More durable than you think)The band it comes with isnt bad but there are plenty of commercial options to customize.I purchased the non-cellular option becuase my phone is always with me at all times anyway. I didnt need to spend the extra on an option I didnt need.I would recommend avoiding the zoom text feature, though. It doesnt help you see small print, unless you like reading one word at a time, and it’s a pain to turn off.So, before you spend your hard earned cash. Think about WHY you want wearable tech and functions you desire. But i am very happy with this product.

author: Sultana
title: Horrible for fitness tracking, great as a phone accessory.
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: I want to preface this by saying that this watch is great, if you don't mind charging it on a daily basis (sometimes multiple times daily) and are only interested in smartwatch features. As someone who bought this mainly for fitness tracking features, however, I was left incredibly disappointed. This is NOT a fitness watch.I excercise 1-2 hours daily, and I go on long hikes every month. I found myself having to charge this watch, at minimum, twice a day. I decided to test it during a day that I did a 1 hour long workout and a 4 hour long hike. It died halfway through my hike. This was a deal-breaker, since I got this watch mainly for the purposes of tracking my excercise activity. The Apple watch was insufficient for tracking the amount of excercise I preform on a daily basis, and unless you carry a battery pack, it's impractical for anyone who wants a dedicated fitness tracker. In addition, I found myself having to download multiple apps just to track calories and activity. This was a hassle.If your activity level is low and you're mainly interested in smartwatch features, then this may be the watch for you. It has a good built-in GPS, but be aware that it drains the battery very quickly thus rendering it useless. The heart-rate monitor seems to be accurate. This watch is not for anyone who is an athlete, as it dies ridiculously quickly when used for such purposes. I was so disappointed in the battery life of the Apple watch 3, that I don't even understand why Apple bothers calling it a tool for fitness tracking. They might as well just do away with the fitness tracking and simply make it a phone interface device, because that is what you'll get out of it: the ability to answer phone calls, messages, and control other phone apps. I know some who are not very physically active, and they are ecstatic with the Apple watch.  But if you're interested in seriously tracking fitness, then you're better off sticking to brands like Garmin and Fitbit.I replaced this with a Garmin Instinct, and am astounded with how much better the battery life and fitness features are. The Apple watch gets a lot of praise, but don't be so quick to believe the hype like I did or else you may end up disappointed too.

author: Arynn Octavia
title: You get what you pay for
types: Size: 38mmStyle: Space Gray Aluminum with Black Sport Band
body: My wife wanted a fitness tracker for Christmas. After unsuccessfully trying one in the $60 range that came with inadequate, poorly translated instructions and stopped working within 24 hours of her opening it, we concluded that you probably get what you pay for. We decided to choose between a FitBit, and an Apple Watch. Since we’re both familiar with Apple products (as owners of iPhones, iPads, and an Apple TV) we decided to go with the Apple Watch. To save money, we got the older version (3rd gen) rather than the newest on the market. She’s only had it a few days, but so far it works great, and battery life is what you’d expect. The watch is good looking, my wife likes the intuitive operation and customizablity, and it integrates well with our current Apple products and our Philips Hue home lighting system. The wife loves it, and now that I’ve seen what it’s like, I’ve decided I want one too. The Apple Watch was the most expesive option we explored, but for current users of Apple products, it is well worth the price-You really do get what you pay for. I also like the tracking of outdoor walks/run better than the Fitbit.I do miss the sleep tracking function of the Fitbit Versa. I realize there are apps I could download but would rather that be a built in feature.  I also miss the vibrate alarm from the Fitbit already being built in. I still use this watch as a silent alarm but now just have to remember to change the alarm noise when setting it in my phone.My desire for getting a smart watch was for text and call notifications when at work (I’m a RN) and this has surpassed that as I use it for so much more.

author: Common Sense Reviews
title: Over glorified digital time on a pixelated screen.
types: Size: 42mmStyle: Silver Aluminum with White Sport Band
body: There's nothing special about these watches. Besides receiving notifications, tracking your activity movement, and having cute screensavers on your wrist, this device is bulky and almost useless. It's overly complicated than what it should be with no immediate print instructions on how to work it, only finding out by much trial and error then finally looking it up on their site, and doesn't even have water coverage for rain. Someone else and myself decided to buy it together and in less than 24 hours later, their watch broke from the rain water leaking in their device while on a run. They were extremely underwhelming and despite all the widgets that could be added on top of its already existing software, it was borderline useless. We purchased just the GPS version. It's just a very limited miniature phone stats reader on your wrist which weigh you down. It may look fancy and sleek on boasting wise I suppose, but it's a heavy and fat little stump on your wrist. The heart rate is not even close to being accurate at all. There's no volume control for things outside of your classic pinger. The screen is bugged for receiving anything no matter what setting you place it in. The charge doesn't last long at all doing absolutely nothing, the whole 8+ hour charge is false. This thing sitting on top of my desk completely drained itself in a few hours without any consumption in storage, usage or connection. I have other activity bands that cost but a fraction of these prices and nearly do all the same things, for the lower end models. It's absurd someone would spent half a grand or more over a new series 4 edition. The only real practicality of it is if you don't want to carry your phone on a short gas station chore around the corner, or a quick GPS tracker for your walk around the neighborhood. That's it. And even then, you have to pay an addition fee for Cellular as you all might know, but paying the extra $10+ a month isn't worth it at all. And don't get a drop of water on it or it'll break. The speaker is low in phone calls, and you can't even type a reply if you need to. I had very high expectations and was very glad to receive my own set, to be let down very quickly. I wouldn't spend more than $150 on this. I could continue on more elaborate detail but that's there to name a few. Seriously, unless you're bathing in diamonds with blocks of gold as your tub, don't burn your cash on this. The brags aren't worth what you really get in return.
